Wolfblade::

She transformed into wolf mode and looked at Malice while wagging her 
wolf tail. "Well, let's get going. The sooner I'm outside, the 
better." She turned and walked outside. 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice nodded and called out to Nightlight.
> "Nightlight, Wolfblade and I are leaving for a while.  We'll be 
back 
> before dark hopefully."
> He turned to Wolfblade and motioned to follow him.  They left the 
> base and Malice transformed into his beast form.  
> "It may take a mega- cycle to get there, so be prepared for a good 
> walk."
>
